info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Perry County through 845 PM CDT... At 759 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willisville, or 12 miles southwest of Pinckneyville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pinckneyville, Du Quoin and Tamaroa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southern Illinois.
